== Main Inclusion Report for xchat-gnome ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/x/xchat-gnome/, builds on all platforms.

2. ''Rationale:'' we may want to ship it instead of xchat by default

3. ''Security:'' No CVEs or other security issues

4. ''Quality assurance:''  
** No major bugs known,
** No Debian package
** Use xchat code so will have the same issues likely

5. ''Standards compliance:''
** Standard `cdbs` packaging.
** FHS met.
** Debian policy met.

6. ''Dependencies:''
** all in main

7. "Comment:"
** the code is basically a copy of xchat with the gnome part to src/fe-gnome/, they do syncs on xchat

MartinPitt: approved
